entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening then changing to periods of wet snow mixed with rain before morning. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
